segments.text: Good morning . I'd like a business suit made with this material .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have a particular style in mind ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The kind that never goes out of fashion , I guess .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think you should realize that even the most conservative style changes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sure you're right . I just dread the idea of making a new suit every year .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The changes are usually not that dramatic . We just got some pictures of the latest fashion . Would you like to take a look ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good . I think I'll choose this single breasted one . When can I get it ?
segments.speaker: S2
